about_the_game:
STORY :

In The Greys: Human Abductions, you step into the shoes of a man who has just inherited his brother's mysterious house after he went missing and was presumed dead. As you explore your brother’s home, you uncover a hidden attic filled with top-secret documents, recordings, and unsettling evidence of alien encounters. The further you delve into the mystery, the more you experience the same terror, as your brother, strange noises, unexplainable events, and even the terrifying possibility of alien abduction. Will you discover the truth behind your brother's disappearance, or will you become the next victim of the unknown forces at play?

Features & Gameplay :

- Open drawers, pick up and inspect documents, play recordings, and interact with lights, doors, and hidden compartments.

- Solve intricate puzzles that involve finding keys, deciphering codes, and unlocking mysterious boxes.

- Experience terrifying sounds of strange noises, footsteps, whispers, and eerie alien phenomena. The audio design is a core component of the game, amplifying the fear and dread as you explore and interact with the environment.

Play old VHS footage you find in the game!

- Unexplainable events occur, lights flicker, and shadows move in the corner of your eye. When strange events start to escalate, you’ll need to find places to hide.

- The fear escalates as you dig deeper into the story. The more you uncover, the more real the danger becomes

This Demo have only 1 Ending.

- The Full Game will have Multiple Endings and your choices throughout the game will affect the ending.

name: The Greys: Human Abductions Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In The Greys: Human Abductions, you discover top-secret documents and unsettling alien evidence. As you explore, encounter strange noises, bizarre events, and the chilling possibility of abduction. Will you uncover the truth or become the next victim?
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Slovak*
*languages with full audio support
